Privacy policy

Ogani highly protect your personal information and never share to anyone. To know further, you should read the privacy policy carefully. We trust in deep security to protect your data. Sharing your data like as name, number, email, address, picture, date of birth etc which have been submitted in our server & we promise to protect these. We have a huge technical supported team to prevent unauthorized access to or harm to your data. After assembling your data, we hold your personal details on a secured server. And it's our responsibility not to disclose your data publicly. In order to complete the delivery of your product(s), sometimes we have to give your information to the second party & we ensure you that we extremely control them by our rules. If they break our rules, we'll be restricted them instantly. WABMart has no right to access your account with your password. The password is only secret data of you. It never remain in us. If you forget, do reset. But we awfully admonish you to never share your password to anyone even WABMart Authorities. We assure you to close your account at anytime if you want. WABMart has given you the full freedom to do this. After all, A customer is the king to us and we respect his/her decision always.
